Description: Saudi Basic Industries Corp (known as: SABIC) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. SABIC operates within the Materials sector focusing on Commodity Chemicals. It has Companies operating across Eastern Asia, Southern and Central Asia, North America, South America, British Islands, Western Europe, Southeast Asia, Central America, Middle East and Southern Europe. SABIC is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1977.
